message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested in the product but  $140 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! However, I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135.
